snippet: Demonstrations in Hong Kong put the Obama administration in the awkward position of wanting to support pro-democracy forces without alienating a key partner.
abstract: Diplomatic Memo; Obama administration is trying to navigate uneasy situation of showing support for pro-democracy protesters in Hong Kong without alienating China ahead of Pres Obama's scheduled visit to meet with Pres Xi Jinping.
lead_paragraph: Demonstrations in Hong Kong put the Obama administration in the awkward position of wanting to support pro-democracy forces without alienating a key partner.

headline.main: An Inconvenient Protest for Both China and the U.S.
headline.print_headline: An Inconvenient Protest for Both China and U.S.
